answers.answer: Hello,Odor in urine can be due to diet like coffee or asparagus, infection like bladder or urinary tract, dehydration or diabetes. You should visit your doctor for a urine examination and evaluation to find out the exact cause and treatment for the foul smell.I sincerely hope that helps. Take care.

question: I have had a few uti's in the last 30+ years so I know the causes, recognize the symptoms and take precautionary measures.  Over the last 6-8 months, my urine took on a strong odor daily that seems different from infection type odor and I don't have the classic symptoms.  I went to the doctor for another reason (ear infection) and he prescribed amoxycillin.  I was happy that it not only took care of the ear but also the urine odor.  However, 3 weeks later, the same odor is back!  I'm wondering what is going on.
title: UTI's and urine odor
